      • toggleFullScreen

        public final void toggleFullScreen()
        Toggles fullscreen on and off. This should put the game into full-screen exclusive mode

      • setDisplayResolution

        public final void setDisplayResolution(javax.media.nativewindow.util.Dimension resolution)
        Sets the resolution the game will display at. If we are currently in fullscreen mode this method will change the resolution of the display device. If we are in windowed mode it will simply change the size of the window.
        Parameters:
        resolution - New resolution to display at

      • toggleVSync

        public void toggleVSync()
        Toggle vsync onn and off

      • setCursor

        public final void setCursor(Cursor cursor)
        Sets the current cursor
        Parameters:
        cursor - Cursor that will be rendered

        Returns:

      • registerTextRenderer

        public void registerTextRenderer(Text.TextType type,
                        com.jogamp.opengl.util.awt.TextRenderer textRenderer,
                        java.awt.FontMetrics metrics)
        Registers a TextType. TextTypes must be registered with OpenGLGameWindow before than can be used.
        Parameters:
        type - The TextType enum to associate with
        textRenderer - the TextRenderer containing all the font information
        metrics - the FontMetrics containing the font metric data

      • getFPS

        public float getFPS()
        Gets the FPS that the game is currently rendering at
        Returns:
        FPS that the game is rendering at

      • renderScene

        public void renderScene(Scene s)
        Pass a scene to this method to render it. This method is for engine use only
        Parameters:
        s - Scene to render
